corporate.mainSubtitle: As Esas Consultancy, we offer comprehensive consultancy services in data security and privacy.
corporate.section1Text1: We provide comprehensive consultancy services to ensure businesses fully comply with Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK) and the principle of 'privacy of private life' as set forth in Article 20 of the Constitution.
corporate.section1Text2: Our goal is to secure companies' personal data processing procedures on a legal basis, eliminate risks, and establish a sustainable compliance structure. Data security is not only a legal requirement, but also a strategic element that directly affects businesses' reputation, reliability, and customer loyalty.
corporate.section1Text3: We meticulously manage your VERBIS registration and compliance process with our expert team, supporting you at every step.
corporate.section2VisionText: To be a brand recognized for its reliability in the consultancy field, creating difference at both national and international levels.
corporate.section2MissionText: To produce legal, practical, and sustainable solutions by deeply analyzing our business partners' needs. We aim to be a trustworthy guide in helping our clients achieve their goals by demonstrating an approach based on knowledge, experience, and ethical values at every step.
corporate.section3Text1: Every business has its own unique dynamics, culture, and challenges. As Esas Consultancy, we believe that no process can be sustainable without understanding these differences.
corporate.section3Text2: Therefore, the first step of our consultancy begins with truly understanding your business. We analyze your sector, operational structure, and existing risk areas in detail, reporting our findings with measurable data.
corporate.section3Text3: For us, consultancy does not end with a file delivery. We stand by you as an accessible, transparent, and solution-oriented business partner at every stage of the process. Esas Consultancy offers cooperation built on the foundation of trust, transparency, and sustainability, not just regulatory compliance.
corporate.section4Text1: Esas Consultancy applies a confidentiality policy to all information and documents shared from the first meeting, and destroys all documents and notes obtained after the completion of the work.
corporate.section4Text2: Esas Consultancy also generally commits that it will not share client information with anyone, valuing its clients' information.
corporate.section4Text3: Client confidentiality and reliability are among the most fundamental elements of our service quality. We carefully protect this principle in every project.

services.mainSubtitle: We provide professional services in a wide range, from KVKK compliance to company establishment, from brand protection to contract consultancy.

service1.title: Personnel Record Management and Organization
service1.description: Complete and systematic organization of all personnel documents for employees within the framework of Labor Law and relevant legislation is ensured. Detailed inventory of existing files is prepared, mandatory and optional documents for each employee are defined. A prioritized action plan is prepared to complete deficiencies. All arrangements made during the service process are documented in a way that will provide evidence in case of legal disputes in the future.

service2.title: KVKK Compliant Employee Document Preparation
service2.description: Information texts, explicit consent forms and personnel file contents related to employees are revised within the framework of KVKK. Which personal data are processed on which legal basis, retention periods and destruction procedures are clearly defined. The service aims to guarantee the compliance of physical document contents with legislation and aims for the documents to be complete in terms of content and declaration. The templates and guidelines provided are prepared to strengthen the institution's defense during audits.

service3.title: Audit Preparation & File Improvement Package
service3.description: Personnel files and HR processes are scanned with internal audit methodology; identified non-compliances are classified according to risk level. Corrective activities that can be implemented in the short term are determined, and a 'compliance improvement report' is delivered with a step-by-step implementation schedule. The report includes a list of basic documents that may be requested during the audit, the priority of eliminating deficiencies, and a brief evaluation to be presented to senior management. The service aims to reduce the institution's risk of administrative sanctions.

service4.title: HR Process Standardization and Personnel Regulation Preparation
service4.description: Easy-to-implement, legislation-compliant policies and regulations are prepared for recruitment, hiring documents, leave management, disciplinary processes, performance evaluation and termination procedures. Regulation drafts are customized according to the company's operational structure; they are finalized with applicability tests and revision cycles. Delivery includes regulation document, implementation guide and necessary forms package. The prepared arrangements are structured in a way that managers and HR teams can implement consistently.

service5.title: Hiring and Termination Processes
service5.description: The necessary document set, work start procedures and document flow scheme are created during the hiring phase; hiring forms, contract examples and declaration controls are provided. In the process of terminating the employment contract, standardized applications are offered for termination procedures, exit documents and arrangement of waiver/minutes in accordance with procedural and formal requirements. The processes are supported by balanced texts that will minimize the employer's legal risk and protect the worker's rights. Delivery includes hiring and exit packages and implementation guide.

service6.title: Service & Employee Contract Template Package
service6.description: Employee contract templates suitable for various working forms (indefinite term, fixed term, project-based, remote work, etc.) and supplier and service contract examples are prepared. Confidentiality, intellectual property, non-competition, wage-related provisions and termination conditions in contracts are arranged clearly and in accordance with legislation. Sector-specific risk clauses are added when necessary. The delivered package includes template sets and application notes suitable for the company's rapid use and revision.

service7.title: Company Establishment – Operational Startup Package
service7.description: Following the completion of the establishment process, necessary human resources documentation and initial compliance controls are prepared for operational startup. Recruitment forms, personnel file templates, basic internal procedures and KVKK preliminary preparation documents required in the first phase are provided. Additionally, when legal monitoring of company establishment procedures is required, coordination with the relevant legal department is provided. Delivery includes the 'post-establishment operation handbook' and the first 3-month compliance checklist.

service8.title: Trademark & Patent Preliminary Assessment and Application Preparation
service8.description: By conducting preliminary research on trademarks and inventions, a report on protection potential, conflict risks and strategic classification is presented. The preparation of application files, clarification of necessary explanations and claims, and the design of monitoring procedures for registration processes are provided. The delivered preliminary assessment report covers the application strategy and possible legal objection risks. The application process is carried out in coordination with the legal department when necessary.

service9.title: Reporting, Monitoring and Periodic Control System
service9.description: A periodic audit plan and reporting mechanism is established for the sustainability of all regulatory and improvement work carried out. Monthly/quarterly report formats, monitoring indicators (e.g. document completion rate, number of open issues) and update recommendations are delivered to you. Reports present legal and operational evaluations together in a way that will form the basis for management decisions.

service10.title: Corporate Training: HR Compliance, KVKK and File Management
service10.description: Legislation-compliant application trainings are designed for HR teams and managers; trainings are structured to include case studies, template applications and practical checklists. Participants' application competencies are measured as a result of the trainings and a short roadmap is given for follow-up. Delivery includes training materials, participant certificates and applicable action lists.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How long does the KVKK compliance process take?
faq.answer1: The KVKK compliance process varies depending on the size of your company and your current data processing activities. On average, it is completed in 4-8 weeks. We can determine the exact duration after the initial assessment.
faq.question2: What documents should personnel records include?
faq.answer2: According to the Labor Law, personnel records must include; employment contract, identity card copy, diploma or certificate copy, health report, photograph, work start notification and disciplinary records if any. We will provide you with a detailed list.
faq.question3: What stages are followed in the company establishment process?
faq.answer3: The company establishment process includes; determining the company type, preparing the articles of association, depositing capital, applying to the trade registry, tax office registration and SGK procedures. We provide guidance at every stage.
faq.question4: How does the trademark application process work?
faq.answer4: The trademark application process consists of; preliminary research, application file preparation, application to the Turkish Patent and Trademark Office, examination process and registration stages. The process takes an average of 12-18 months.
faq.answer5: Our pricing is determined according to the scope, complexity and duration of the project. We prepare special offers for each of our customers. You can contact us for detailed information.
